live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
50420.summary: Customers are experiencing login issues when accessing the shaw.ca, support.shaw.ca websites and the mobile app. We are working to resolve this as soon as possible, however there is no estimated time of resolution available. We thank you for your patience.
